Acolyte.equipment: holy symbol, prayer book or prayer wheel, 5 sticks of incense, vestments, set of common clothes, belt pouch
Acolyte.feature: respected by those of your faith, may ask for aid from others of same faith

Anthropologist.equipment: leather-bound diary, 1-ounce ink bottle, ink pen, set of traveler's clothes, one trinket of special significance, pouch
Anthropologist.feature: can communicate on a rudimentary level with any humanoids you observe interacting for 24 hours
